#summary Describing snapshots for which date PURLs have been allocated
#labels Featured

= IAO Ontology URI =

 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao.owl 

Currently points to http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/2009-03-17/iao.owl

= Ontology Metadata URI = 

 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/ontology-metadata.owl

Currently points to http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/2009-03-17/ontology-metadata.owl

= Allocated PURLs =

 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/2008-11-24/iao.owl
 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/2008-11-24/ontology-metadata.owl
 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/2009-01-23/iao.owl
 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/2009-01-23/ontology-metadata.owl

 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/2009-07-15/iao.owl
 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/2009-07-15/ontology-metadata.owl

= Development version purls =

 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/dev/iao.owl 
 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/dev/ontology-metadata.owl 
 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/dev/iao-main.owl
 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao/dev/obsolete.owl

= OWL 1 usage =

Use the PURL for the version you want. Ignore any complaints from tools that the ontology URI doesn't match the physical URI

= OWL 2 usage =

Use http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao.owl as the ontologyIRI and the PURL for the version you want as the versionIRI.

See http://www.w3.org/2007/OWL/wiki/Syntax#Ontology_IRI_and_Version_IRI
